sentence.idiomatic: The flower wilted, what a shame.
This kind of flower doesn't die in the winter.
The peach blossoms have died. When will they bloom again?
You're all about smooth talking me, when you should be thinking about how to make a lot of money.
You are all just talk, you never do anything.
I still need to work. I don't have any time to listen to your smooth talk.
This is one of the newest engines that has been developed.
The airplane developed by our own country has officially been put into use already.
At present, there haven't been any medications developed to treat this illness.
The professor is speaking too profoundly; a lot of the students are asleep.
You are really amazing--being able to take such a deep concept and express it so simply.
This book is so deep, I can't understand it at all.
Teachers shouldn't use test results to measure a student's ability.
Love cannot be measured by money.
From what aspects do you think a person's value can be measured?

word.literal: to not be able to rely on

sentence.idiomatic: Good-looking guys aren't reliable--they are always playboys.

word.literal: to be unable to rely on

sentence.idiomatic: An oral promise is not dependable. You had better sign a written contract.

word.literal: to be able to depend upon
to not be able to depend on

sentence.idiomatic: I want to find an individual who can help me manage my money. I wonder if he is reliable or not?
His words are very sincere, they really put me at ease.
Although I won't be well-off with him, the kind of life we'll have is very stable.
Now that my things are finished, I feel much more at ease.
Relatively speaking, his point of view is more convincing.
Relatively speaking, I like his plan better.
Everything is relative. If you look at things from another angle you will have a different view.
You finally made it! I've been waiting for you forever.
I am only a couple of minutes late.
While I am waiting for you, one minute is like one hour. With you sitting right next to me, one hour is like one minute.
You just love to smooth talk!
I don't dare! This is Einstein's theory of relativity.
Do you understand the theory of relativity?

I studied it before. That is the relative relationship between time and space. There are specialized and general theories of relativity. The theory behind specialized relativity is that the movement of physical objects is relative. Speed and time are also relative, with the speed of light being constant.
So, is that like how at high speeds time slows down?
Yes--if the speed of the physical object is as fast as the speed of light. A lot of scientists want to develop time machines!
Only in science-fiction films. That's beyond comprehension. What about the general theory of relativity?
The general theory of relativity... movement, gravitational fields, and so forth...
How mysterious! I am more interested how the theory of relativity applies to morality and culture.
Standards are different, therefore the conclusions reached will be different, right?
Yeah. For example, we think that not taking care of the elderly is immoral, but some other societies don't think that way.
You cannot use the same standard to measure all matters.
One can only understand a culture when within the context of the country itself.
It's the same in life. For example, a good man is also relative.
Those with looks and money are not reliable. An honest but simple man is boring, and a romantic is not dependable.
So, relatively speaking, I'm pretty good.
You....

word.literal: to be unable to rely on
to be able to rely on
